Introduction
This topic contains information on award adjustments necessitated by a Veteran’s return to and discharge from active duty, including
relinquishment of benefits upon return to active duty
handling notice that a Veteran has returned to active duty
effective date for discontinuing compensation or pension
discontinuing benefits in the Veterans Benefits Management System -- Awards (VBMS-A) when the Veteran will return to active duty on a date that is in the future
handling the pending claim of a Veteran who returns to active duty
action to take upon receipt of
DD Form 214
,
Certificate of Release or Discharge from Active Duty
, and
a request for reinstatement of compensation
rating decisions that show loss of entitlement during periods of active duty
proper effective date for a grant of entitlement to an increased disability rating or service connection (SC)
proper application of 38 CFR 3.31
, and
discontinuing and reinstating Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) benefits in the same award action
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B  - Award Adjustments Necessitated by a Veteran's Return to and Discharge From Active Duty
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B
